description: Datasets used in the Fish-PACE 2025 tutorials (Parquet, NetCDF, and related files in tutorial_data/).
license: Open access where specified by each dataset's source; see per-item metadata.

properties.title: Global Bio-Argo CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins)
properties.description: Per-profile CHLA metrics from all global BGC-Argo floats from Mar 2024 to Nov 2025, depth-binned from 0–200 m in 10 m bins using unadjusted CHLA values.
properties.license: Open access (Argo Data Policy); unrestricted use with attribution.

data.title: Global Bio-Argo CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins)

properties.title: Global Bio-Argo CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490 matchups
properties.description: Per-profile CHLA metrics from all global BGC-Argo floats from Mar 2024 to Nov 2025, depth-binned from 0–200 m in 10 m bins using unadjusted CHLA values, matched to PACE OCI Level-3 4 km v3.1 Daily Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490. Profiles are matched to PACE Level-3 pixels within 24 hours of the file t_start attribute and to the nearest 4 km grid cell in latitude/longitude.
properties.license: Open access (Argo Data Policy); unrestricted use with attribution.

data.title: Global Bio-Argo CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490 matchups

properties.title: Global OOI CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490 matchups
properties.description: Depth-binned CHLA metrics from all OOI Profilers and Moorings from Mar 2024 to Dec 2025, Depth-binned from 0–200 m in 10 m bins using unadjusted CHLA values, matched to PACE OCI Level-3 4 km v3.1 Daily Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490. Profiles are matched to PACE Level-3 pixels within 24 hours of the file t_start attribute and to the nearest 4 km grid cell in latitude/longitude.
properties.license: Open access; unrestricted use with attribution.
properties.platform: OOI Profilers and Moorings + PACE OCI

data.title: Global OOI CHLA profile metrics (0–200 m, 10 m bins) with PACE Rrs, chlor_a, and Kd_490 matchups
